name: Kha'Zix
title: the Voidreaver

P.name: Unseen Threat

effects.description: Innate: Kha'Zix gains Unseen Threat whenever the enemy loses sight of him or he activates Void Assault. Unseen Threat causes his next basic attack against an enemy champion to deal 14 − 116 (based on level) (+ 40% bonus AD) bonus magic damage and slow them by 25% for 2 seconds. Once gained, the empowered attack lasts until used.

P.notes:
Any form of vision loss may trigger Unseen Threat, such as  Curse of the Black Mist,  nearsight and  Brushmaker.
 Void Assault grants Unseen Threat even if Kha'Zix never becomes unseen (e.g. affected by  true sight).
Other  stealth such as  Senna's  Curse of the Black Mist and  Duskblade of Draktharr does not do this.
Both the attack's damage and bonus spell damage are grouped under the same Spell ID.
Because of this, a single Unseen Threat attack does not trigger two  Electrocute stacks.
P.blurb: When Kha'Zix is not visible to the enemy team, he gains Unseen Threat, causing his next basic attack against an enemy Champion to deal bonus magic damage and slow.

Q.name: Taste Their Fear

effects.description: Passive: Kha'Zix considers any enemy unit that does not have any of their allies near them and any monster that is not near another one as Isolated. Taste Their Fear, Evolved Reaper Claws, and Evolved Spike Racks have special interactions against Isolated targets.
Active: Kha'Zix slashes the target enemy, dealing them physical damage, increased by 110% against Isolated targets.

Q.notes:
A team's allies are  champions,  pets,  minions and outer  turrets.
 Monsters are considered allies for other monsters.
 Wards do not prevent Isolation.
A number of targetable champion summoned units are specifically tagged to not be a valid ally of a potentially Isolated target. These units are:
 Gangplank's  Powder Keg
 Illaoi's  Prophet of an Elder God
 Jhin's  Captive Audience
 Nidalee's  Bushwhack
 Rek'Sai's  Tunnel
 Senna's  Absolution's Mist Wraiths
 Teemo's  Noxious Trap
 Viego's  Sovereign's Domination's Mist Wraiths
 Yorick's  Dark Procession
Isolated targets are marked by an  indicator to Kha'Zix when visible and within 2500 units of him. However, Isolation bonuses are evaluated when the relevant spells hit and thus enemies do not need to show the indicator for them to receive the effects.
Q.blurb: Deals physical damage to the target. Damage increased on Isolated targets. If he chooses to Evolve Reaper Claws, this refunds a percent of it's cooldown against Isolated targets. Kha'Zix also gains increased range on his basic attacks and Taste Their Fear.

effects.description: Passive - Evolved Reaper Claws: Kha'Zix gains 50 bonus range on his basic attacks and Taste Their Fear.
If the target is Isolated, the cooldown is reduced by 45%.

W.name: Void Spike

effects.description: Active: Kha'Zix fires a cluster of spikes in a line in the target direction that detonates upon hitting an enemy, dealing physical damage to all enemies within the area.
Kha'Zix heals himself if he is within the detonation radius.

W.notes: Void Spike will cast from wherever Kha'Zix is at the end of the cast time.
W.blurb: Kha'Zix fires exploding spikes that deal physical damage to enemies hit. Kha'Zix is healed if he is also within the explosion radius. If he chooses to Evolve Spike Racks, Void Spike now fires three spikes in a cone, slow enemies hit, and reveals enemy champions hit for 2 seconds. Isolated targets are slowed for extra.

W.name: Evolved Spike Racks

effects.description: Passive - Evolved Spike Racks: Void Spike fires three clusters in a cone, slows by 60% and reveals enemy champions hit for 2 seconds. Multiple explosions do not deal extra damage to the same target nor provide Kha'Zix with additional healing.
Isolated targets hit by Evolved Spike Racks are slowed by 90% instead.

W.notes:
Evolved Spike Racks will cast from wherever Kha'Zix is at the end of the cast time.
 Spell shield will not block the  reveal.

E.name: Leap

effects.description: Active: Kha'Zix leaps to the target location, dealing physical damage to nearby enemies upon landing.
Taste Their Fear can be used during Leap.

E.notes: Kha'Zix can use his summoner spells and item actives while  leaping.
E.blurb: Kha'Zix leaps to an area, dealing physical damage upon landing. If he chooses to Evolve Wings, Leap's range increases by 200 and the cooldown resets on champion kill or assist.

E.name: Evolved Wings

effects.description: Passive - Evolved Wings: Leap gains 200 increased range and its cooldown is reset on enemy champion takedowns.

E.notes: Kha'Zix can use his summoner spells and item actives while  leaping.

R.name: Void Assault

effects.description: Passive: Each rank in Void Assault allows Kha'Zix to evolve one of his abilities, granting it additional effects. Choosing an ability initiates a 2 second cast time, during which Kha'Zix advances his form, receiving the evolution once it completes.
Active: Kha'Zix becomes invisible for 1.25 seconds, gaining 40% bonus movement speed while stealthed.
After 2 seconds of leaving invisibility, and for the next 10 seconds, Void Assault can be cast a second time at no additional cost.
Recast: Kha'Zix mimics the first cast's effects.

R.notes:
Each cast counts as an ability activation for the purposes of on-cast effects such as Spellblade and stacking  Force Pulse.
Kha'Zix receives the evolution even if he dies while in cast time.
Every time Void Assault is ranked, a secondary menu will pop up for Kha'Zix to select an ability to evolve, this can only be done once per ability.
The only way for Kha'Zix to evolve all of his abilities is to gain the fourth evolution point by being victorious in The Hunt is On! (by scoring a  takedown on  Rengar).
R.blurb: Each rank allows Kha'Zix to evolve one of his abilities, giving it a unique additional effect. When activated, Kha'Zix becomes Invisible, triggering Unseen Threat and increasing Movement Speed. If he chooses to Evolve Adaptive Cloaking, while out of combat Kha'Zix also passively gains Void Assault upon entering a new brush.

effects.description: Passive - Evolved Adaptive Cloaking: Increases the invisibility duration to 2 seconds, and can be cast up to 3 times.

lore: The Void grows, and the Void adapts—in none of its myriad spawn are these truths more apparent than Kha'Zix. Evolution drives the core of this mutating horror, born to survive and to slay the strong. Where it struggles to do so, it grows new, more effective ways to counter and kill its prey. Initially a mindless beast, Kha'Zix's intelligence has developed as much as its form. Now, the creature plans out its hunts, and even utilizes the visceral terror it engenders in its victims.

skins.name: Original
skins.lore: The Void grows, and the Void adapts—in none of its myriad spawn are these truths more apparent than Kha’Zix. Evolution drives the core of this mutating horror, born to survive and to slay the strong. Where it struggles to do so, it grows new, more effective ways to counter and kill its prey. Initially a mindless beast, Kha’Zix’s intelligence has developed as much as its form. Now, the creature plans out its hunts, and even utilizes the visceral terror it engenders in its victims.

skins.name: Mecha
skins.lore: Designated K-ZX, the “Mecha Kha'Zix” unit was the first of the mecha line to be deployed against the kaiju threat. Due to its smaller size, it functions best in urban environments, adapting on the fly to threats against civilian populations.

skins.name: Guardian of the Sands
skins.lore: Kha'Zix, the devouring scarab—ancient guardian of the sands, we invoke thee to protect us from an evil of our own making. Let no man tread upon these hallowed grounds, lest you consume them utterly.

skins.name: Death Blossom
skins.lore: Hidden among the great flower-fields of the north are the Death Blossoms, primeval hunters whose disarming beauty would lull even the bravest knight to tears, if but for a moment. For Kha'Zix, feeding upon these hardy souls offers yet another chance at metamorphosis… and a moment is all he needs.

skins.name: Dark Star
skins.lore: The hunger of the abyss, Kha'Zix is an alien horror whose ceaseless appetite feeds the Dark Star. Appearing before planets like a titanic locust, it devours all it encounters—the power of a hundred thousand stars fueling its evolution into an ever-greater threat.

skins.name: Odyssey

descriptions.description: Obtained through Influencer audience giveaways
This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the 2020 Worlds event.
This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2020.

skins.lore: A member of an elite bounty hunting organization, Kha'zix is cold, ruthless and always gets the job done. Though hired by Karma to track down the missing templars, she doesn't realize that Kha'zix is a double agent secretly working for Aatrox to bring Karma to him.
